verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sweet adoration
Flows from Your children
Glory and honor and praise
Are a part of our constant devotion,
Love set in motion
For the Divine One
Who reigns in our hearts.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When I am troubled
By heartache and struggle,
I come and adore You,
You take me away
From all worldly sensation
And endless temptation;
All of my trials
Are lost in Your love.
